| History                 = The Gnucci Crime Family was a Mafia-like group led by [[Isabella Carmela Magdalena Gnucci (Earth-616)|Isabella Carmela Magdalena "Ma" Gnucci]], that controlled many of illegal activities in [[New York City]].

The family came into conflict against [[Frank Castle (Earth-616)|Frank Castle]] once he started to kill Ma Gnucci's sons in order to announce his return to criminals and the New York underwold.{{r|Punisher Vol 5 1}} Ma Gnucci sent her own men and hired vigilantes against him, to no avail.{{r|Punisher Vol 5 2}}

Castle eventually faced Ma Gnucci herself when she ambushed him at the [[Central Park Zoo]]. Despite his disadvantage, Castle managed to kill all her men and throw Ma to a pack of polar bears.{{r|Punisher Vol 5 4}}

Despite Ma Gnucci's survival, Castle was able to eventually kill her and all her thugs, ending the criminal organization for good.{{r|Punisher Vol 5 11|12}}
